statements: SELECT * FROM production_line_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machine_id, machine_output FROM production_line_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY machine_output ASC;
SELECT id, defect_rate FROM production_line_data WHERE defect_rate IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data WHERE machine_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, machine_output, timestamp FROM production_line_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM production_line_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machine_id, SUM(machine_output) AS total_output FROM production_line_data GROUP BY machine_id HAVING SUM(machine_output) > 1000;
SELECT id, machine_output, timestamp FROM production_line_data WHERE defect_rate > 0.1 ORDER BY timestamp;
SELECT * FROM production_line_data WHERE machine_id = 3 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT DISTINCT machine_id, COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM production_line_data GROUP BY machine_id ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_outputs;
SELECT machine_id, output_value FROM machine_outputs ORDER BY machine_id DESC;
SELECT machine_id, output_value, timestamp FROM machine_outputs WHERE output_value > 100;
SELECT defect_id, machine_id, defect_type FROM defect_rates ORDER BY defect_count DESC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type, defect_count, timestamp FROM defect_rates WHERE machine_id = 10;
SELECT machine_id, output_value, timestamp FROM machine_outputs WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM machine_outputs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT defect_id, defect_type FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_count > 10;
SELECT machine_id, AVG(output_value) AS avg_output FROM machine_outputs GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(defect_id) AS total_defects FROM defect_rates GROUP BY machine_id ORDER BY total_defects DESC;
SELECT machine_id, output_value, timestamp FROM machine_outputs ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT machine_id, output_value, timestamp FROM machine_outputs WHERE machine_id = 1;
SELECT machine_id, output_value, timestamp FROM machine_outputs WHERE output_value > 100 ORDER BY output_value ASC;
SELECT machine_id, COUNT(defect_id) AS total_defects FROM defect_rates GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT production_id, total_outputs, total_defects, defect_rate FROM production_analysis WHERE defect_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY defect_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM machine_outputs WHERE machine_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT defect_type, COUNT(defect_id) AS total_defects FROM defect_rates GROUP BY defect_type HAVING COUNT(defect_id) > 2;
SELECT machine_id, SUM(output_value) AS total_output, AVG(output_value) AS average_output FROM machine_outputs GROUP BY machine_id HAVING total_output > 1000 ORDER BY average_output DESC;

SELECT machine_outputs.machine_id, production_id, defect_type FROM machine_outputs JOIN defect_rates ON machine_outputs.machine_id = defect_rates.machine_id ORDER BY machine_outputs.timestamp ASC, defect_rates.timestamp DESC;

SELECT machine_id, defect_type, defect_rate FROM defect_rates JOIN production_analysis ON defect_rates.machine_id = production_analysis.production_id WHERE production_analysis.defect_rate < 0.05 AND defect_rates.timestamp >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY production_analysis.defect_rate ASC, defect_rates.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM machine_outputs ORDER BY output_value ASC;
SELECT machine_id, timestamp, output_value FROM production_data WHERE machine_id = 2;
SELECT machine_id, AVG(defect_rate) AS average_defect_rate FROM defect_rates GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT production_id, production_data.machine_id, output_value, setting_id, setting_value FROM production_data JOIN machine_settings ON production_data.machine_id = machine_settings.machine_id;
SELECT * FROM machine_settings WHERE setting_value LIKE '%high%';
SELECT * FROM machine_outputs WHERE output_value > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT machine_id, output_value FROM machine_outputs WHERE machine_id = 2 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY output_value ASC;
SELECT machine_id, defect_rate FROM defect_rates WHERE defect_rate < 0.5 ORDER BY defect_rate DESC;
SELECT production_id, machine_id, output_value, defect_id FROM production_data WHERE machine_id IN (1,3,5) ORDER BY production_id;
SELECT machine_id, setting_value FROM machine_settings WHERE setting_id = 3 ORDER BY machine_id;
SELECT * FROM machine_outputs;
SELECT machine_id, output_quantity, timestamp FROM production_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, output_quantity, defect_id FROM production_data WHERE output_quantity > 100;
SELECT machine_id, maintenance_type, maintenance_duration FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_duration > 60;
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE result < 0.5;
SELECT * FROM production_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT machine_id, AVG(output_quantity) AS avg_output_quantity FROM machine_outputs GROUP BY machine_id;
SELECT defect_type, SUM(defect_rate) AS total_defect_rate FROM defect_rates GROUP BY defect_type HAVING SUM(defect_rate) > 0.2;
SELECT machine_id, analysis_type, result FROM analysis_results WHERE result > 0.8 ORDER BY machine_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_records WHERE maintenance_type = 'repair' AND maintenance_duration > 60 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
